locationFreeQuests.title: Challenge-a-Friend Fiesta
locationFreeQuests.description: Challenge a friend to a different fitness activity each day and compare results at the end of the week.

locationFreeQuests.title: Morning movement
locationFreeQuests.description: Complete a 20-minute morning workout routine. Include exercises like jumping jacks, squats, and high knees.

locationFreeQuests.title: Adventure Photographer Challenge
locationFreeQuests.description: Capture and share five creative exercise-related photos from different locations during the week.

locationFreeQuests.title: Stairs Sprint
locationFreeQuests.description: Opt for the stairs instead of the elevator. Incorporate a brief stair workout at home or work each day.

locationFreeQuests.title: Jump Rope Jamboree
locationFreeQuests.description: Jump rope for 15 minutes, incorporating different tricks.

locationFreeQuests.title: Jumping Jackpot
locationFreeQuests.description: Do as many jumping jacks as you can in 5 minutes; better defeat yourself in the past.

locationFreeQuests.title: Super Sports Spectacle
locationFreeQuests.description: Try a different sport or physical activity each day, from basketball to rock climbing.

locationFreeQuests.title: Office Break Revitalizer
locationFreeQuests.description: Incorporate short bursts of activity during work breaks. Stretch, do a quick yoga session, or take a brisk walk outside, even chair squats. desk push up.

locationFreeQuests.title: Post-Work Unwind
locationFreeQuests.description: Wind down after work with a 30-minute relaxation workout, such as yoga or a calming stretch routine.

locationFreeQuests.title: Commute Cardio Challenge
locationFreeQuests.description: Integrate exercise into your daily commute. Choose an active mode of transportation, like biking or walking, for at least part of the journey.

locationFreeQuests.title: Tech Detox Day
locationFreeQuests.description: Designate one day a week for a tech detox. Spend at least 60 minutes doing physical activities without electronic devices.

locationFreeQuests.title: Chores & Calisthenics Challenge
locationFreeQuests.description: Turn household chores into a workout. Perform squats while doing laundry or lunges while vacuuming.

locationFreeQuests.title: Couch potato workout
locationFreeQuests.description: Turn TV time into a workout session. 6 minutes of different plank positions, 1 minute of wall sit, 5 minutes of bridge, 1 minute of mountain climber.

locationFreeQuests.title: Active Social Hour
locationFreeQuests.description: Plan a socially active evening, whether it's a group fitness class, a sports activity, or a social jog with friends.

locationFreeQuests.title: Stretching kick-off
locationFreeQuests.description: Spend 15 minutes to stretch every morning to start your day, 7 days in a row.

quests.title: Wellness Walk Challenge
quests.description: Take a 45-minute walk around the neighborhood of Huawei Health Lab, noting at least 5 unique landmarks or natural features. Share your experience with a photo or a short story.

quests.title: Tech Trailblazer
quests.description: Visit three technology landmarks in Helsinki, including the Huawei Health Lab. Document each visit with a photo and a brief note about what you learned.

quests.title: Innovative Explorer
quests.description: Create a short video tour of the Huawei Health Lab, highlighting its contributions to health and technology. Share the video on social media with a hashtag #HuaweiHealthInnovation.

quests.title: Park explorer
quests.description: Spend 30 minutes in a nearby park, either walking or biking, and take a picture of 3 things that excites you.

quests.title: Nature photographer
quests.description: Take a picture of 3 things that excites you.

quests.title: The Boulderer
quests.description: Boulder alone or with your team in at least 1 hour.

quests.title: Library finder
quests.description: Count how many rooms it has over there (don’t google)

quests.title: Swim Streak Splash
quests.description: Swim 2km distance or complete 10 laps in the pool.

quests.title: Swim Streak Splash
quests.description: Swim 5km distance or complete 25 laps in the pool.

quests.title: Meat or Meet
quests.description: Can you recognize how many stores are there in the hall?

quests.title: Mindfulness
quests.description: Take 3 laps around the park and think about your dinner.
